issue.title: Only accept 'y' or 'n' in merge_arrow_pr.py prompts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4686](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4686). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current prompt syntax ("y/n" with neither capitalized) implies there's no default, which I think is the right behavior, but it's not implemented that way. Script should retry until either y or n is received.
